Reference

Models

plm0()

Power Law Model with constant variance

plm()

Power Law Model

gplm0()

Generalized Power Law Model with Constant Variance

gplm()

Generalized Power Law Model

Tournament - Model comparison

tournament()

Determine the most adequate rating curve model

Methods for plm0 objects

print(<plm0>)

Print plm0 object

summary(<plm0>)

Summarizing plm0 fit

autoplot(<plm0>)

Autoplot plm0 fit

plot(<plm0>)

Plot plm0 fit

predict(<plm0>)

Predict method for plm0 fit

get_report_pages(<plm0>)

Get report pages

get_report(<plm0>)

Get plm0 fit report

Methods for plm objects

print(<plm>)

Print plm object

summary(<plm>)

Summarizing plm fit

autoplot(<plm>)

Autoplot plm fit

plot(<plm>)

Plot plm fit

predict(<plm>)

Predict method for plm fit

get_report_pages(<plm>)

Get report pages

get_report(<plm>)

Get plm fit report as pdf file

Methods for tournament objects

print(<tournament>)

Print tournament object

summary(<tournament>)

Print summary of tournament object

autoplot(<tournament>)

Autoplot - Comparison of models in tournament

plot(<tournament>)

Plot comparison of models in tournament

get_report_pages(<tournament>)

Get report pages

get_report(<tournament>)

Get tournament report

Data manipulation functions

spread_draws()

Spread MCMC chain draws to data.frame on a wide format

gather_draws()

Gather MCMC chain draws to data.frame on a long format

Bunnerviken river in Sweden
